source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View casework_hedgerow_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build casework_hedgerow_dim_new table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

-- CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_hedgerow_dim_new

--      AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT 
    CASE
        WHEN T1.full_ref IS NULL
        THEN T3.HedgerowID
        ELSE NULL
    END as HedgerowID,
    T1.ref_year AS RefYear,
    T1.identifier AS Identifier,
    T1.full_ref AS FullRef,
    T1.horizn_ref AS HorizonRef,
    T1.processing_state AS ProcessingState,
    T1.lpa AS LPA,
    T1.receipt_date AS ReceiptDate,
    T1.name_of_appellant AS NameOfAppellant,
    T1.agent AS Agent,
    T1.site_address AS SiteAddress,
    T1.postcode AS Postcode,
    T1.corr AS Corr,
    T1.case_officer AS CaseOfficer,
    T1.appeal_type AS AppealType,
    T1.withdrawn_or_rejected AS WithdrawnOrRejected,
    T1.date_wd_or_r AS DateWithdrawnOrRejected,
    T1.acknow_date AS AcknowDate,
    T1.valid_date AS ValidDate,
    T1.start_date AS StartDate,
    T1.2_week_date AS TwoWeekDate,
    T1.6_week_date AS SixWeekDate,
    T1.9_week_date AS NineWeekDate,
    T1.questionnaire_received AS QuestionnaireReceived,
    T1.inspector AS Inspector,
    T1.procedure AS Procedure,
    T1.event_date AS EventDate,
    T1.date_sent_to_inspector AS DateSentToInspector,
    T1.date_rec_from_insp AS DateRecFromInspector,
    T1.decision AS Decision,
    T1.reader_sent_to AS ReaderOrSentTo,
    T1.date_decision_issued AS DateDecissionIssued,
    T1.target_date AS TargetDate,
    T1.notes AS Notes,
    T1.put_away AS PutAway,
    T1.pa_barcode AS PABarcode,
    T1.ready_for_event AS ReadyForEvent,
    T1.receipt_to_start_average AS ReceiptToStartAverage,
    T1.start_to_event_average AS StartToEventAverage,
    T1.event_to_decision_average AS EventToDecisionAverage,
    T1.receipt_to_decision_average AS ReceiptToDecisionAverage,
    T1.handle_time_in_weeks AS HandleTimeInWeeks,
    T1.decision_month AS DecisionMonth,
    T1.open_or_closed AS OpenOrClosed,
    T1.old_case_off_not_to_be_used AS OldCaseOffNotToBeUsed,
    T2.SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.ref_year,'.'), IFNULL(T1.identifier,'.'), IFNULL(T1.full_ref,'.'), IFNULL(T1.horizn_ref,'.'), IFNULL(T1.processing_state,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.lpa,'.'), IFNULL(T1.receipt_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.name_of_appellant,'.'), IFNULL(T1.agent,'.'), IFNULL(T1.site_address,'.'), IFNULL(T1.postcode,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.corr,'.'), IFNULL(T1.case_officer,'.'), IFNULL(T1.appeal_type,'.'), IFNULL(T1.withdrawn_or_rejected,'.'), IFNULL(T1.date_wd_or_r,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.acknow_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.valid_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.start_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.2_week_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.6_week_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.9_week_date,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.questionnaire_received,'.'), IFNULL(T1.inspector,'.'), IFNULL(T1.procedure,'.'), IFNULL(T1.event_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.date_sent_to_inspector,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.date_rec_from_insp,'.'), IFNULL(T1.decision,'.'), IFNULL(T1.reader_sent_to,'.'), IFNULL(T1.date_decision_issued,'.'), IFNULL(T1.target_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.notes,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.put_away,'.'), IFNULL(T1.pa_barcode,'.'), IFNULL(T1.ready_for_event,'.'), IFNULL(T1.receipt_to_start_average,'.'), IFNULL(T1.start_to_event_average,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.event_to_decision_average,'.'), IFNULL(T1.receipt_to_decision_average,'.'), IFNULL(T1.handle_time_in_weeks,'.'), IFNULL(T1.decision_month,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.open_or_closed,'.'), IFNULL(T1.old_case_off_not_to_be_used,'.'))) as RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields, so needs to be done
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.full_ref = T3.FullRef AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.ref_year,'.'), IFNULL(T1.identifier,'.'), IFNULL(T1.full_ref,'.'), IFNULL(T1.horizn_ref,'.'), IFNULL(T1.processing_state,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.lpa,'.'), IFNULL(T1.receipt_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.name_of_appellant,'.'), IFNULL(T1.agent,'.'), IFNULL(T1.site_address,'.'), IFNULL(T1.postcode,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.corr,'.'), IFNULL(T1.case_officer,'.'), IFNULL(T1.appeal_type,'.'), IFNULL(T1.withdrawn_or_rejected,'.'), IFNULL(T1.date_wd_or_r,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.acknow_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.valid_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.start_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.2_week_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.6_week_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.9_week_date,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.questionnaire_received,'.'), IFNULL(T1.inspector,'.'), IFNULL(T1.procedure,'.'), IFNULL(T1.event_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.date_sent_to_inspector,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.date_rec_from_insp,'.'), IFNULL(T1.decision,'.'), IFNULL(T1.reader_sent_to,'.'), IFNULL(T1.date_decision_issued,'.'), IFNULL(T1.target_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.notes,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.put_away,'.'), IFNULL(T1.pa_barcode,'.'), IFNULL(T1.ready_for_event,'.'), IFNULL(T1.receipt_to_start_average,'.'), IFNULL(T1.start_to_event_average,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.event_to_decision_average,'.'), IFNULL(T1.receipt_to_decision_average,'.'), IFNULL(T1.handle_time_in_weeks,'.'), IFNULL(T1.decision_month,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.open_or_closed,'.'), IFNULL(T1.old_case_off_not_to_be_used,'.'))) <> T3.RowID   -- same employee, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.FullRefIS NULL -- new AppealRef
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.full_ref IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData, 
    T3.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.casework_specialist_hedgerow T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Casework" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim T3 ON T1.full_ref = T3.FullRef AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    (
        -- flags new data        
        (   CASE
                WHEN T1.full_ref = T3.FullRef AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.ref_year,'.'), IFNULL(T1.identifier,'.'), IFNULL(T1.full_ref,'.'), IFNULL(T1.horizn_ref,'.'), IFNULL(T1.processing_state,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.lpa,'.'), IFNULL(T1.receipt_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.name_of_appellant,'.'), IFNULL(T1.agent,'.'), IFNULL(T1.site_address,'.'), IFNULL(T1.postcode,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.corr,'.'), IFNULL(T1.case_officer,'.'), IFNULL(T1.appeal_type,'.'), IFNULL(T1.withdrawn_or_rejected,'.'), IFNULL(T1.date_wd_or_r,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.acknow_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.valid_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.start_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.2_week_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.6_week_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.9_week_date,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.questionnaire_received,'.'), IFNULL(T1.inspector,'.'), IFNULL(T1.procedure,'.'), IFNULL(T1.event_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.date_sent_to_inspector,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.date_rec_from_insp,'.'), IFNULL(T1.decision,'.'), IFNULL(T1.reader_sent_to,'.'), IFNULL(T1.date_decision_issued,'.'), IFNULL(T1.target_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.notes,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.put_away,'.'), IFNULL(T1.pa_barcode,'.'), IFNULL(T1.ready_for_event,'.'), IFNULL(T1.receipt_to_start_average,'.'), IFNULL(T1.start_to_event_average,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.event_to_decision_average,'.'), IFNULL(T1.receipt_to_decision_average,'.'), IFNULL(T1.handle_time_in_weeks,'.'), IFNULL(T1.decision_month,'.'), 
    IFNULL(T1.open_or_closed,'.'), IFNULL(T1.old_case_off_not_to_be_used,'.'))) <> T3.RowID  -- same employee, changed data
                THEN 'Y'
                WHEN T3.FullRefIS NULL -- new PositionCode
                THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
            END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        (   CASE
                WHEN T1.full_ref IS NULL
                THEN 'Y'
                ELSE 'N'
            END = 'Y' )
    );

    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM odw_standardised_db.casework_specialist_hedgerow;
    SELECT COUNT(*) FROM casework_hedgerow_dim_new;

# Run tests to check integrity of data by numbers
- This script checks for the total number of current codes in the harmonised table, and compare against the numbers for new data to be added and data to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tracking:** where it checks the data against active records in harmonised and compares with records to add and records to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tolerance levels:** if the total amount to be added and deleted surpasses the tolerance limit, it will interrupt the process of loading the data

# Run tests to check integrity of data by comparison of codes
- This script checks for the total list of current codes in the harmonised table, and compare against the list for new data to be added and data to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tracking:** where it checks the data against active records in harmonised and compares with records to add and records to be set as inactive.

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View casework_hedgerow_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_hedgerow_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
Select 
    HedgerowID,
    RefYear,
    Identifier,
    FullRef,
    HorizonRef,
    ProcessingState,
    LPA,
    ReceiptDate,
    NameOfAppellant,
    Agent,
    SiteAddress,
    Postcode,
    Corr,
    CaseOfficer,
    AppealType,
    WithdrawnOrRejected
    DateWithdrawnOrRejected,
    AcknowDate,
    ValidDate,
    StartDate,
    TwoWeekDate,
    SixWeekDate,
    NineWeekDate,
    QuestionnaireReceived,
    Inspector,
    Procedure,
    EventDate,
    DateSentToInspector,
    DateRecFromInspector,
    Decision,
    ReaderOrSentTo,
    DateDecissionIssued,
    TargetDate,
    Notes,
    PutAway,
    PABarcode,
    ReadyForEvent,
    ReceiptToStartAverage,
    StartToEventAverage,
    EventToDecisionAverage,
    ReceiptToDecisionAverage,
    HandleTimeInWeeks,
    DecisionMonth,
    OpenOrClosed,
    OldCaseOffNotToBeUsed,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive

From casework_hedgerow_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    HedgerowID,
    RefYear,
    Identifier,
    FullRef,
    HorizonRef,
    ProcessingState,
    LPA,
    ReceiptDate,
    NameOfAppellant,
    Agent,
    SiteAddress,
    Postcode,
    Corr,
    CaseOfficer,
    AppealType,
    WithdrawnOrRejected
    DateWithdrawnOrRejected,
    AcknowDate,
    ValidDate,
    StartDate,
    TwoWeekDate,
    SixWeekDate,
    NineWeekDate,
    QuestionnaireReceived,
    Inspector,
    Procedure,
    EventDate,
    DateSentToInspector,
    DateRecFromInspector,
    Decision,
    ReaderOrSentTo,
    DateDecissionIssued,
    TargetDate,
    Notes,
    PutAway,
    PABarcode,
    ReadyForEvent,
    ReceiptToStartAverage,
    StartToEventAverage,
    EventToDecisionAverage,
    ReceiptToDecisionAverage,
    HandleTimeInWeeks,
    DecisionMonth,
    OpenOrClosed,
    OldCaseOffNotToBeUsed,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim
WHERE FullRef IN (SELECT FullRef FROM casework_hedgerow_dim_new WHERE HedgerowID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

# View casework_hedgerow_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim AS Target
USING casework_hedgerow_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.HedgerowID = Target.HedgerowID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new casework_hedgerow_dim

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY FullRef NULLS LAST) AS HedgerowID,
    RefYear,
    Identifier,
    FullRef,
    HorizonRef,
    ProcessingState,
    LPA,
    ReceiptDate,
    NameOfAppellant,
    Agent,
    SiteAddress,
    Postcode,
    Corr,
    CaseOfficer,
    AppealType,
    WithdrawnOrRejected
    DateWithdrawnOrRejected,
    AcknowDate,
    ValidDate,
    StartDate,
    TwoWeekDate,
    SixWeekDate,
    NineWeekDate,
    QuestionnaireReceived,
    Inspector,
    Procedure,
    EventDate,
    DateSentToInspector,
    DateRecFromInspector,
    Decision,
    ReaderOrSentTo,
    DateDecissionIssued,
    TargetDate,
    Notes,
    PutAway,
    PABarcode,
    ReadyForEvent,
    ReceiptToStartAverage,
    StartToEventAverage,
    EventToDecisionAverage,
    ReceiptToDecisionAverage,
    HandleTimeInWeeks,
    DecisionMonth,
    OpenOrClosed,
    OldCaseOffNotToBeUsed,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim;
